üßµLiquidation Alchemy Part 2 ‚Äî The Hidden Web of Leverage No One Wants to See

Perps dominate crypto trading ‚Äî Behind the scenes, exchanges are building opaque insurance funds,secret credit lines, ADL exemptions that leave the entire ecosystem vulnerable to cross-platform failure
BitMEX‚Äôs OG setup showed the core issue: Liquidations + ADL = winners get ‚Äúinvoluntarily‚Äù closed out and paid less than their full profit. Thin-tailed markets‚Ä¶ until real fat-tailed events hit and everything breaks.üìâ
Today‚Äôs twist?  
Binance reportedly exempts some large users from ADL entirely. A hidden list of traders who get full payouts while others take haircuts. ‚úÇÔ∏è
Hyperliquid liquidated huge numbers on Oct 10 ‚Äî stayed online ‚Äî then used profits to buy back its own token. But it has no other businesses, no fallback, and the code isn‚Äôt fully public. Transparency? Partial at best.üå´Ô∏è
Meanwhile, exchanges are extending trust and credit to each other with almost no oversight. ByBit, Copper, Ethena ‚Äî all tied together. One refusal to transfer margin can cascade into insolvency across multiple platforms.üåä
This is how you get a chain reaction: Haircuts ‚Üí withheld winnings ‚Üí defaults on other platforms ‚Üí automated ADLs ‚Üí more defaults ‚Üí a giant exchange collapses.üß®
Web3 promised a system free of leverage. Instead, the leverage has just been renamed, made opaque, and networked across platforms in ways that could make the next failure bigger than Mt. Gox, Terra-LUNA, and FTX combined.üí•
#Crypto #DeFi #CryptoTrading #Liquidation #LeverageTrading #Web3 #RiskManagement #Perps #Hyperliquid #BitMEX

Gate Ventures, ADEN Explorer Released

The hybrid decentralized exchange ADEN, recently acquired by Gate Ventures, has launched its own Explorer, enabling full verification of all on-chain DeFi activity‚Äîincluding blockchain transactions, wallet activity, and more.

Like Hyperliquid, ASTER, EdgeX, and Lighter, ADEN operates using a hybrid model, where order matching is performed off-chain while settlement updates are bundled and recorded on-chain in batches.

$HYPE Hyperliquid Strategies Inc. (NASDAQ: PURR), a digital asset treasury company focused on accumulating the HYPE token, announced on Dec 8, 2025, that its Board of Directors has authorized a stock repurchase program for up to $30 million of its outstanding common stock. The program will run for up to 12 months, with repurchases handled at management's discretion based on market conditions, stock price, and legal requirements.
